text: Rohrbach-Berg is a municipality in Rohrbach District of Upper Austria, Austria. As of 1 January 2019, population was 5183. The municipality was formed on 1 May 2015 by merging two municipalities, Rohrbach in Oberösterreich and Berg bei Rohrbach. It is the seat of Rohrbach District, having taken it from Berg bei Rohrbach. == Localities == The municipality includes the following populated places (Ortschaften), with population as of 1 January 2019: {| |- | width="25%" | * Arbesberg (53) * Autengrub (14) * Berg (956) * Fraundorf (33) * Frindorf (55) * Fürling (143) * Gattergaßling (28) * Gierling (9) | width="25%" | * Gintersberg (8) * Gollner (111) * Grub (29) * Harrau (34) * Hauzenberg (20) * Hehenberg (60) * Hintring (28) * Hundbrenning (76) | width="25%" | * Katzing (48) * Keppling (57) * Krien (38) * Lanzerstorf (139) * Märzing (52) * Neundling (89) * Nößlbach (91) * Perwolfing (58) | width="25%" | * Reith (48) * Rohrbach (2448) * Scheiblberg (89) * Schönberg (22) * Sexling (206) * Spielleiten (20) * Steineck (54) * Wandschaml (44) |} ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Rohrbach District
title: Rohrbach-Berg
